data.text: Gbalona Ariyele taan xa, Ariyele!29.1 Ariyele findixi Yerusalɛn taan xili gbɛtɛ nan na be. Dawuda Yerusalɛn taan yɛngɛ feen sɛbɛxi Samuyɛli firinden 5.6-9 kui.
koni n na Ariyele taan yɛngɛma nɛn.
N nan n ma ganla tima nɛn ɛ taan nabilinni.
Ɛ fe yigodoma nɛn han a lu
Ɛ yaxu yamaan luma nɛn
Alatala Sɛnbɛn Birin Kanna fama i malideni
Ariyele kaane,
Kamɛn muxun naxan ma,
Ɛ kabɛ, ɛ ɛ dundu!
Amasɔtɔ Alatala bata ɛ xaxinli fu,

Fe makɛnɛnxini itoe birin bata lu ɛ tan xa alo fala sɛbɛxine kɛdi mafilinxini, naxan balanxi taxamasenna ra. Ɛ a so muxu xaranxina nde yii, ɛ yi a fala a xa, ɛ naxa, “Ito xaran nxu xa yandi.” A ɛ yabima nɛn, a naxa, “N mi nɔɛ a xaranɲɛ, kɛdin balanxin na ra.”
Hanma ɛ xa a so xarantarena nde yii, ɛ naxa, “Ito xaran nxu xa yandi!” A ɛ yabima nɛn, a naxa, “N mi nɔɛ sɛbɛnla xaranɲɛ!”
Marigin naxa,
Nanara, n mɔn luma nɛn yamani ito ratɛrɛnɛ kabanako feene ra.
Gbalon na kanne xa
Anu, ɛ bata tantan fefe!
Benun waxatidi,
Na lɔxɔni,
Tɔrɔ muxune sɛwa gbeen sɔtɔma nɛn Alatala yi,
Amasɔtɔ gbalotɔne tununma nɛn,
naxanye wulen sama muxune xun ma kitisadeni,
Nanara, Alatala naxan Iburahima xunba,
Amasɔtɔ e tan nun e diine n kɛwanle toma nɛn,
Naxanye yi lɔxi ayi e miriyane xɔn,
